name: Skeleton Invader
description:
Skeleton Invader 

The 3D use Skeletons to animate models.

World talk a lot about models, texturing or animations.

And only few things about the Skeletons !

This is the Uprising !

Skeletons leave their model and want conquer the world.

Now, Leader (The master of Skeleton) offers you a chance to stop the invasion ...
